messages.validationError: Please check your information and agree to the required terms.
messages.idInUse: This ID is already in use.
messages.unsafePassword: This password is not secure. Please use a different one.
messages.agreeToRequiredTerms: Please agree to all required terms of service.

rules.pwnedPassword:
This password has been exposed in a data breach.
Please use a different password.

passwordComplexity.title: Password Complexity
passwordComplexity.rule2: Include letters, numbers, and special characters
passwordComplexity.rule3: Cannot be the same as your ID
passwordComplexity.rule4: Cannot include your birth date or phone number
passwordComplexity.rule6: Include both uppercase and lowercase letters

dialogs.confirmSignUpMessage: Would you like to complete your sign-up with the information you provided?
dialogs.privacyTitle: Consent to Collection and Use of Personal Information
dialogs.privacySectionTitle: Details of Personal Information Collection and Use
dialogs.retentionInfo: Information will be destroyed immediately upon account withdrawal. However, if storage is required by relevant laws, it will be preserved for the specified period.
dialogs.refusalTitle: Right to Refuse Consent and Disadvantages
dialogs.refusalContentPrivacy: You have the right to refuse consent to the collection and use of personal information. However, if you refuse consent for required items, your sign-up and use of related services may be restricted.
dialogs.agreeRequired: (Required) I agree to the collection and use of personal information.
dialogs.agreeMarketing: (Optional) I agree to receive marketing information (Email, SMS).
dialogs.thirdPartyTitle: Consent to Overseas Transfer and Processing of Personal Information
dialogs.thirdPartySectionTitle: Details of Overseas Transfer and Processing
dialogs.transferPurpose: Operation of cloud database servers and secure storage/management of data
dialogs.transferItems: All personal information collected at sign-up (ID, password, email, etc.)
dialogs.transferRetention: Until account withdrawal or termination of the consignment contract
dialogs.refusalContentThirdParty: You have the right to refuse consent to the overseas transfer and processing of your personal information. However, refusal will prevent core service functions from operating, making sign-up and all service use impossible.
dialogs.agreeThirdParty: (Required) I have confirmed all the above and consent to the overseas transfer and processing of my personal information.
dialogs.etcSection1Content: Describe the first major policy or other notices in detail here. It can be composed of multiple paragraphs. It is advisable to convey important information that the user must know clearly and concisely.
dialogs.etcSection2Content: Write the second notice here. For example, it could include service usage rules, content copyright policies, or dispute resolution procedures.
dialogs.etcListItem1: Item 1: Specify related detailed rules or guidelines.
dialogs.etcListItem2: Item 2: Another important matter that the user must comply with.
dialogs.agreeEtc: (Required) I have confirmed all other terms above and agree to them.
